attributes.action: Leave the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR)
attributes.additional_details: We urge the government to prioritize the needs and safety of UK citizens by withdrawing from the ECHR. This move will allow the UK to regain control over its borders, reduce the financial burden on taxpayers, restore national sovereignty, and enhance national security.
attributes.background: We urge the UK government to withdraw from the ECHR to regain control over immigration, reduce taxpayer costs, restore national sovereignty, and enhance security. Billions are spent on illegal immigrants while UK citizens suffer. Prioritize UK needs and safety.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum to decide if the UK should leave the ECHR.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700614
